ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ACE Electron Proton Alpha Monitor (EPAM) CA60 PHA Ion SEP Event Matrix Data, 17 min Averages

RevisionEvent.Note: Last prior known metadata Release Date
ACE: DOI and PublicationInfo added, DataProducer PersonID updated, metadata revised by J.M. Weygand, reviewed by LFB 2022-05-17
ACE: Updated to SPASE Version 2.4.0, revised by LFB on 2022-05-17

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Pulse Height Analyzer matrix data for a single Solar Energetic Particle event from the ACE:EPAM instrument. Using the PHA data, one can quickly and very accurately determine composition.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies LLC

PublicationInfo.Authors: Gold, R.E., Roelof, E.C., Krimigis, S., Haggerty, D., Armstrong, T., Manweiler, J.W., and Patterson, J.D.

InformationURL.Name: Explanation of EPAM print-groups and CSV file nomenclature.
InformationURL.Description: The Explanation HTML page at Fundamental Technologies describes how the numeric data from the ACE EPAM instrument are divided into different print-groups, the nomenclature of the ASCII-based comma-separated variable (CSV) files, and how those files can be accessed.

AccessURL.Name: ACE EPAM PHA Event Data
AccessURL.Description: Parent directory containing the PHA event data for the ACE/EPAM instrument for the entire mission.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies LLC

Parameter.Name: Time for the record
Parameter.Description: Time for the record given in year, day of year, hour, min, and decimal seconds. The given time represents the beginning of the event interval.

Parameter.Name: Number of Events
Parameter.Description: Number of C/D pairs contained in this event file.

Parameter.Name: Event time offset
Parameter.Description: Time offset for a given C/D pair in hundredths of a second

Parameter.Name: Sector
Parameter.Description: Sector, 1-8, in which the C/D event pair occurs.

Parameter.Name: C1 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the first sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D1 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the first sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: C2 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the second sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D2 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the second sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: C1 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the first sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D1 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the first sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: C2 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the second sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D2 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the second sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: Priority Schedule
Parameter.Description: Schedule for species priority: 0 - Fe, O, He, H 1 - O, Fe, H, He 2 - H, Fe, O, He 3 - He, Fe, O, H

Parameter.Name: Event 1 Channel
Parameter.Description: Channel which triggered the first event pair, W1-W8.

Parameter.Name: Event 2 Channel
Parameter.Description: Channel which triggered the second event pair, W1-W8.
